Class MassTransferConfig

java.lang.Object
neqsim.fluidmechanics.flowsolver.twophaseflowsolver.twophasepipeflowsolver.MassTransferConfig
public class MassTransferConfig extends Object
Configuration class for mass transfer calculations in two-phase pipe flow.

Provides user-configurable parameters for transfer limiting, convergence, stability, and model options. Default values are based on literature recommendations and numerical stability analysis.

Literature References:

  • Krishna, R., Standart, G.L. (1976). Mass and energy transfer in multicomponent systems. Chemical Engineering Communications, 3(4-5), 201-275.
  • Solbraa, E. (2002). Measurement and modelling of absorption of carbon dioxide into methyldiethanolamine solutions at high pressures. PhD thesis, NTNU.
  • Taylor, R., Krishna, R. (1993). Multicomponent Mass Transfer. Wiley.
Version:
1.0
Author:
ASMF

  • Field Details

    • maxTransferFractionBidirectional

      private double maxTransferFractionBidirectional
      Maximum fraction of available moles that can transfer in BIDIRECTIONAL mode per node. Default 0.9 (90%) provides good stability for most cases.

      Literature: Krishna & Standart (1976) recommend limiting single-node transfer to prevent numerical oscillations.

    • maxTransferFractionDirectional

      private double maxTransferFractionDirectional
      Maximum fraction of available moles that can transfer in directional modes per node. Default 0.5 (50%) is more conservative for single-direction scenarios.

    • useAdaptiveLimiting

      private boolean useAdaptiveLimiting
      Whether to use adaptive limiting based on local Courant-like condition. When true, the transfer limit adapts to local conditions (flow rate, interfacial area, etc.).

    • convergenceTolerance

      private double convergenceTolerance
      Convergence tolerance for mass transfer calculations. Default 1e-4 provides good balance between accuracy and speed.

    • maxIterations

      private int maxIterations
      Maximum number of iterations for mass transfer solver.

    • minIterations

      private int minIterations
      Minimum iterations to perform before checking convergence.

    • minMolesFraction

      private double minMolesFraction
      Minimum relative mole fraction below which a component is considered depleted. This is relative to total system moles.

    • absoluteMinMoles

      private double absoluteMinMoles
      Absolute minimum moles for numerical stability.

    • maxTemperatureChangePerNode

      private double maxTemperatureChangePerNode
      Maximum temperature change allowed per node (K). Prevents numerical instabilities from large enthalpy changes.

    • maxPhaseDepletionPerNode

      private double maxPhaseDepletionPerNode
      Maximum fraction of a phase that can disappear in a single node. For complete evaporation or dissolution scenarios.

    • allowPhaseDisappearance

      private boolean allowPhaseDisappearance
      Whether to allow complete phase disappearance.

    • includeMarangoniEffect

      private boolean includeMarangoniEffect
      Whether to include Marangoni effect correction for surface-active components. Reduces mass transfer coefficient for species with high surface activity.

      Reference: Springer, T.G., Pigford, R.L. (1970). Influence of surface turbulence and surfactants on gas transport through liquid interfaces. Ind. Eng. Chem. Fundam., 9(3), 458-465.

    • includeEntrainment

      private boolean includeEntrainment
      Whether to include droplet entrainment in annular flow interfacial area calculation.

      Reference: Ishii, M., Mishima, K. (1989). Droplet entrainment correlation in annular two-phase flow. Int. J. Heat Mass Transfer, 32(10), 1835-1846.

    • includeWaveEnhancement

      private boolean includeWaveEnhancement
      Whether to include wave enhancement for stratified wavy flow interfacial area.

      Reference: Tzotzi, C., Andritsos, N. (2013). Interfacial shear stress in wavy stratified gas-liquid flow. Chem. Eng. Sci., 86, 49-57.

    • includeTurbulenceEffects

      private boolean includeTurbulenceEffects
      Whether to include turbulence effects in mass transfer coefficient correlations.

    • coupledHeatMassTransfer

      private boolean coupledHeatMassTransfer
      Whether to couple heat and mass transfer iteratively. When true, the evaporative cooling / heating effect is properly accounted for.

    • coupledIterations

      private int coupledIterations
      Number of outer iterations for coupled heat-mass transfer.

    • enableThreePhase

      private boolean enableThreePhase
      Whether to enable three-phase mass transfer (gas-oil-water).

    • aqueousPhaseIndex

      private int aqueousPhaseIndex
      Index of the aqueous phase in three-phase systems.

    • organicPhaseIndex

      private int organicPhaseIndex
      Index of the oil/organic phase in three-phase systems.

    • enableDiagnostics

      private boolean enableDiagnostics
      Whether to enable convergence diagnostics and logging.

    • detectStalls

      private boolean detectStalls
      Whether to detect and report convergence stalls.

    • stallDetectionWindow

      private int stallDetectionWindow
      Number of iterations to look back for stall detection.
